descriptions:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

Even though it is
small, it can't be
ignored because it will slug any
handy target with­
out warning.

To brush up on its
fighting skills,
it will challenge anyone. It has a
very strong com­
petitive spirit.

TYROGUE becomes stressed out if it
does not get to train every day.
When raising this POKéMON, the TRAINER must establish and uphold various
training methods.
